movie_title: Private sector urged to move away from using NRIC numbers as means of authentication
introduction: The authorities have urged private sector organisations to move away from using NRIC numbers as a me

vocabulary.example: Authorities have urged private sector organizations to move away from using NRIC numbers.

vocabulary.definition: the process or action of verifying the identity of a user or process
vocabulary.example: Using NRIC's for customer authentication is becoming less common in banks.
Users found that full NRIC numbers could be unmasked on the corporate regulators website.

vocabulary.definition: become subject to or bring upon oneself (usually expenses or costs)
vocabulary.example: Using other authentication methods will incur additional costs for businesses.

vocabulary.definition: skills or methods used to achieve a particular task or activity
vocabulary.example: Businesses need to learn new authentication techniques to enhance security.

vocabulary.definition: existing or happening over a large area or among many people
vocabulary.example: With consumer and business support, there could be widespread adoption of new authentication methods.
